name: Hitchcock's 'The Birds' Online Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT one of the taglines for the movie (tagline is a phrase advertising it)?
options: Suspense and shock beyond anything you have seen or imagined
It could be the most terrifying motion picture I have ever made
Nothing you have witnessed before has prepared you for such sheer stabbing shock

questions.text: What is unusual about this movie?
options: Hitchcock didn't appear somewhere in the Movie
it was based on a true story

questions.text: How does Alfred Hitchcock appear in this movie?
Alfred Hitchcock spotted Tippi Hedren in a commercial for what?
The intended final shot was supposed to be of what covered in birds?
options: Spelling out the end in a field
questions.explanation:
The Golden Gate Bridge.

	This scene was never shot due to the cost it would entail.

questions.text: What place was overtaken by 'The Birds'?
What words did NOT, intriguingly, appear at the end of the movie?
questions.explanation:
The End.

	Hitchcock did not end it with 'The End' because he wanted the audience to feel unending terror.

questions.text: What type of birds did Tippi Hedren's character give to Mitch's sister?
Who wrote the story that 'The Birds' was based on?
